content.text: Read the next text about some school friends having fun at Puerto Vallarta. Can you tell the meaning of the sentences in BOLD?
content.name: wxZY

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-3xl mx-auto

content.text: Last weekend, my school friends and me went to the beach. Puerto Vallarta is splendid during this time of the year, and we celebrated Martha´s birthday. While we were driving there, we saw some dolphins jumping in the ocean, it was incredible because it was not dolphin season Jonh told us that they just come here from December to March. Susi loves sea animals, she said they were "bottlenose dolphins". We were all amazed by the sight therefore we decided to stop for a while to watch them. After a magnificent time by the shore, Jose, Martha, Susi, and Raul played beach volleyball for a few hours, while I was sunbathing. We all had a great time! The weather was perfect, and we had a lot of fun. Later in the evening, we built a bonfire and roasted marshmallows. As the night went on, we shared stories and laughed together. Raul was playing the guitar while we all sang beautiful songs.We were singing "Happy Birthday" while Martha blew out birthday candles. Jose took a lot of pictures as we all were having fun. It was a memorable day; we all had a fantastic time at the beach.
